name: Tempo-Surges #3
description:
Completing long tempo efforts with short, high-intensity surges, is another way to increase threshold power. With the constant high power, the body must process the lactate produced from the above threshold surges. We mix up the tempo work with some long anaerobic efforts for an added stress.
